tasks.label: windows_build_debug
tasks.command: vcpkg install --x-feature=test,dev && cmake -S . -B target/build -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -D ENABLE_COVERAGE=ON -D DEVELOPER_MODE=ON -D BUILD_TESTS=ON -D ENABLE_SIMD=ON && cmake --build target/build --config Debug -j 16 && cmake --install target/build
